trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for representing and editing the values the Windows Workflow Foundation types in an object browser associated with a workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma interface do usuário para representar e editar os valores dos tipos do Windows Workflow Foundation em um Pesquisador de Objetos associado com um designer de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This class allows users to open object browsers associated with any workflow designer and view all types and members that reside in the Windows Workflow Foundation namespaces.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe permite aos usuários abrir pesquisadores de objetos associados a qualquer designer de fluxo de trabalho e exibir todos os tipos e membros que residem nos namespaces Windows Workflow Foundation.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeBrowserEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeBrowserEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> que pode ser usado para obter informações de contexto adicionais.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> that the editor can use to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> que o editor pode usar para obter serviços.

trans-unit.source: Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style indicated by <see cref="Overload:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeBrowserEditor.GetEditStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: Edita o valor do objeto especificado usando o estilo de editor indicado por <see cref="Overload:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeBrowserEditor.GetEditStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
<paramref name="typeDescriptorContext" /> or <paramref name="serviceProvider" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeDescriptorContext" /> ou <paramref name="serviceProvider" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.IServiceProvider.GetService(System.Type)" /> returns a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />) when it attempts to obtain the type provider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.IServiceProvider.GetService(System.Type)" /> retorna uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" />) quando tenta obter o provedor de tipos.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> que pode ser usado para obter informações de contexto adicionais.

trans-unit.source: Returns the editor style used by the <see cref="Overload:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeBrowserEditor.EditValue" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o estilo de editor usado pelo método <see cref="Overload:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeBrowserEditor.EditValue" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle" /> value that indicates the style of editor used by <see cref="Overload:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeBrowserEditor.EditValue" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle" /> que indica o estilo do editor usado por <see cref="Overload:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeBrowserEditor.EditValue" />.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden by an inheriting class, this method returns <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.Modal" />.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituído por uma classe herdada, esse método retorna <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.Modal" />.
